posts.title: Power, Greed, Manipulation, Backstabbing: Lighthearted Reading Recommendations for Fans of Succession
posts.text: For viewers left panting for more—or anyone who knows that you can’t make a Tomelette without breaking some Greggs—there are plenty of books to sink your teeth into while you await each devastating round of boar on the floor.
